DOC.brief_summary: This rollover study design provide continued access GSK2118436 eligible subject BRAF mutation-positive tumor previously participate GlaxoSmithKline ( GSK ) -sponsored GSK2118436 study ( parent study ) , evidence progressive disease tolerate GSK2118436 parent study without significant toxicity . Subjects enrol appropriate cohort base upon treatment receive parent study . Safety assessment ( physical examination , vital sign , 12-lead electrocardiogram , echocardiogram , clinical laboratory assessment , monitor adverse event ) make throughout study . Clinical activity assess use local standard care image practice appropriate response criterion determine investigator .
DOC.brief_title: A Rollover Study Provide Continued Treatment With GSK2118436 Subjects With BRAF Mutation-Positive Tumors
